anchorage.neighborhoods: Downtown, Spenard, Midtown, Turnagain, North Anchorage, South Addition
anchorage.meetingHighlights: Active meetings across the city including community center and church-based groups; strong volunteer service structure.
anchorage.transitInfo: People Mover bus network covers Anchorage; Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport (ANC) for national and regional flights.

fairbanks.neighborhoods: Downtown, College, North Pole area, Ester, Fort Wainwright, Eielson AFB
fairbanks.meetingHighlights: Interior Alaska's recovery hub with meetings year-round; strong university connection near UAF; diverse meetings from downtown to military bases.
fairbanks.transitInfo: Limited bus service via MACS; Fairbanks International Airport (FAI); Alaska Railroad connections.

juneau.neighborhoods: Downtown, Douglas Island, Mendenhall Valley, Auke Bay, Lemon Creek
juneau.meetingHighlights: State capital recovery community with accessible meetings; strong tradition of service; meetings in downtown and valley areas.
juneau.transitInfo: Capital Transit bus service; Juneau International Airport (JNO); Alaska Marine Highway ferry system.

sitka.neighborhoods: Downtown Sitka, Sawmill Creek, Halibut Point, Silver Bay
sitka.meetingHighlights: Island community recovery with close-knit meetings; rich cultural heritage; strong emphasis on community support.
sitka.transitInfo: Sitka Rocky Gutierrez Airport (SIT); Alaska Marine Highway ferry connections; no road access to other cities.
